org.tarantool.facade

Class Mapping<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tarantool.facade.Mapping<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mapping7

    public class Mapping<T>
extends Object
    Maps class to tarantool tuple in specified space
    Version:
    $Id: $
    Author:
    dgreen
